transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning, ma'am.
Customer: [unintelligible] good morning.
Executive: Uh, I'm Shubham bol raha tha IndiaMART, aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan ji, good morning. We got it. Hum start kar sakte hai sir abhi.
Executive: Okay. Okay, okay.
Executive: Toh ma'am, yeh bataiye mujhe mail ID kaunsa hai login aapke system mein abhi?
Customer: [silence]
Executive: Hmm, jismein main connect Google Meet pe connect kar raha hu na main aapse, toh kaunsa mail ID pe main aapko link bhej du?
Customer: [silence]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Shubham aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sir, theek hai sir, I am telling you one second.
Executive: Hello, ab aawaz aa rahi hai na meri?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, sir, ek second dijiye sir aap.
Executive: Haan, haan, okay, okay, bataiye.
Customer: Accounts@atsenviren.com.
Executive: Accounts@ ATS enviren, E N V I R O N.
Customer: R O N enviren.
Customer: .com.
Executive: .com.
Customer: [silence]
Customer: Good morning, kaise ho?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji, haan, ek baar check kariye mail.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, I got it. I'm joining.
Executive: Receive ho gaya na aapko mail?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, receive.
Executive: Join kariye phir. Aur yeh voice vagarah aata hai system mein aapke mein?
Customer: Haan, haan, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek baar join kariye, check karenge phir usi hisab se dekhenge call pe connect karna hai aapko ya phir direct connect karna hai.
Customer: Join kare.
Executive: Aur ma'am, yeh aapka Chandra se baat hua hai, Chandra jo aapke account manager tha, Chandrapal Singh, unse aapka discussion hua hai pehle kabhi isse pehle ya phir aap first time baat kar rahi hai IndiaMART team se?
Customer: Uh, no sir, no.
Customer: Ji ma'am, ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Hello, ab aawaz aa rahi hai aapke paas meri?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ab aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan, ma'am, mujhe mujhe kuch yeh bataiye jo Chandra the aapke account manager, theek hai na? Unse aapki baat hui hai pehle kabhi?
Customer: Uh, no sir, actually meri baat nahi hui hai.
Executive: Achha, aap first time I think IndiaMART ab handle karna hai na?
Customer: Yes, yes.
Executive: Toh hum hamare saath na Chandrapal Singh ne bhi join kiya hua hai, wohi aapke main account manager hai ma'am.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Unka unka detail aapke dashboard mein bhi dikhta hai, theek hai na? And he will guide you through the all the process aur aapko kabhi bhi connect karna hoga future mein toh aap unse hi connect bhi kar sakti hai, woh aapko proper detail bhi check kar denge, theek hai na?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Chandra, theek hai na? Chandra, Chandra start karo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with system login.

- Wants to know about account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive sent Google Meet link to customer.

- Executive informed about account manager Chandrapal Singh.

- Executive said Chandrapal Singh will guide customer.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, account manager, google meet
